abilities.name: Champion
abilities.description: 1 model in this unit can be a Fangleader. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's Rusty Halberd.

abilities.name: Standard Bearer
abilities.description: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Stormvermin Standard Bearer. This unit can retreat and still charge later in the turn if it includes any Stormvermin Standard Bearers.

abilities.name: Musician
abilities.description: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Stormvermin Drummer. Add 2 to run rolls for this unit if it includes any Stormvermin Drummers.

abilities.name: Elite Bodyguards
abilities.description: If a friendly **SKAVEN HERO** is within **3"** of this unit, before you allocate a wound or mortal wound to that **HERO**, or instead of making a ward roll for a wound or mortal wound that would be allocated to that **HERO**, roll a dice. Add 2 to the roll if the HERO has the **CLANS VERMINUS** keyword. On a **4+**, that wound or mortal wound is allocated to this unit instead of that **HERO** and cannot be negated.
